quotes.quote: First, figure out exactly what you want. Then trust in yourself and your ability to achieve it.
If it's worth having, it's worth working for.
Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face.
Arise, awake, and stop not until the goal is achieved.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Forget about goals, focus on systems instead.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: Once you've reached your goal, set a new one. Challenge yourself.
Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: Success isn't an accident because hustle is a choice.
Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale the manifestation of it.
When you focus on your progress, the Universe will send you your destiny.
Begin with the end in mind.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Life is short, fragile and does not wait for anyone. There will never be a perfect time to pursue your dreams and goals.
Stay the course, even when it's rough. You're on your way to your greatest destination yet.
Not all success comes from hard work, it also requires a vision of the end goal.
People with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong and think of what could go right.
Every single one of your dreams is worth fighting for, because you are worth fighting for.
Be happy, but never satisfied.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success, like happiness, is a by-product, not a goal.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: What is the definition of faith? To trust the power of your dreams and desires even though they have yet to be realized.
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Find ways to measure your progress. It's easier to continue when you can see just how far you've come.
The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
Your moment is now. Claim it!
Stay on the path! Each day, you're closer to your goals.
I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
A plateau doesn't mean you're finished. It means it's time to push on to the next level.
The results you want to see tomorrow will be based on the efforts you put in today.
Operate based on principle instead of desire; chase your true goals instead of impulse.
